actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To name the Post Office building located at 200 3d Street, S.W., in Taylorsville, North Carolina, as the "Clifford G. Watts Post Office".

summary.text: Designates a United States Post Office building located at 200 3d Street, S.W., Taylorsville, North Carolina, as the Clifford G. Watts Post Office.

titles.title: To name the Post Office building located at 200 3d Street, S.W., in Taylorsville, North Carolina, as the "Clifford G. Watts Post Office".
